about.paragraph1: My name is Alejandro González, but I think Alex is an informal way, so use which you prefer. I have worked in different roles and projects, from small startups to big corporations, always with the same passion for technology and software development and I'm not afraid of getting out of my comfort zone.
about.paragraph2: I have a strong background in web development, with a focus on JavaScript, Python and their ecosystems. I have experience with both front-end and back-end technologies, and I'm always eager to learn new things and improve my skills.
about.paragraph3: I also enjoy writing technical articles and sharing my knowledge with others. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow as a developer and as a person.
